scripts.migration:clear: set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=%npm_config_env% && dotnet ef database update 0 --project src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj  --startup-project src/API/API.csproj
scripts.migration:create: set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=%npm_config_env% && dotnet ef migrations add %npm_config_name% --project src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj  --startup-project src/API/API.csproj
scripts.migration:list: set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=%npm_config_env% && dotnet ef migrations list --project src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj  --startup-project src/API/API.csproj
scripts.migration:rollback: set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=%npm_config_env% && dotnet ef database update --project src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj  --startup-project src/API/API.csproj
scripts.migration:run: set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=%npm_config_env% && dotnet ef database update --project src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj --startup-project src/API/API.csproj
